mvcomp.py
=========

.. module:: mvcomp
    :synopsis: A module for performing multivariate computations.

.. automodule:: mvcomp
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:

Installation
------------

To install `mvcomp`, you can use pip:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install mvcomp

Usage
-----

Here's an example of how to use `mvcomp` if your data is ready:

.. code-block:: python

    from mvcomp import model_comp

    result = model_comp(feature_in_dir, model_dir=None, suffix_name_comp=".nii.gz", exclude_comp_from_mean_cov=True,
               suffix_name_model=".nii.gz", mask_f=None, mask_img=None, verbosity=1,
               mask_threshold=0.9, subject_ids=None, exclude_subject_ids=None, feat_sub=[], return_raw=False)

    print(result)

API Reference
-------------

.. automodule:: mvcomp
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
